documents.document:
**~29/07/07~**


i finished harry potter n the deathly hallows in lik less then 10 hrs la!!haha not realy veri speedy bud..well sum parts r q boring..finish readin at 6am.. woke up lik at 3 plus..im so piggy!!
*he msg me abt s.h.e stuff last nite..im lying to (him abt how happy im wit joanna(my fake bf)..wen actaully jo. is lik woo'ing hu she realy likes la.. haha bud bb trgn starts tml!!cant wait!!will keep me occupied n tired!!isn't it great?well i cldnt force myself to act "couplely" in front of *him..tts th greatest lie la.. hope i can change my num real soon!!by tt time.*he cant contact me alr..n its th official ending 4 th both of us..altho i may not REALY totally 4get but *him..at least we no longer hv th chance to b tgt..lifes goes on..cant agree any further.. gotta stay happy then torturing myself ehs?gg to study now!!

**~30/07/07~**


long bud boring day!!was on time for sch tdy..beibei didnt come to sch..get well soon oks?miss my cavewoman!!
maths was LONG n i wasnt realy payin attention again..dono y..tdy durin chi we were told to write an essay..the titles were lik super not inspiring la..decided to write on th title "th moment wen i was REALY touched.." *our memories were lik RUNNING thru my mind..went emo for lik afew mins (kris n laopo didint notice till i guess!! )..suddenly i realised..our memories r fading..is tt a good thing or bad?tt moment made me miss *him SO SO SO much.. i guess i miss *him too much n we're lik not meetin at all anw!!wont b able to recall properly our lovely memories..
my god bro *ZX msged me suddenly..
he was lik WIERD la..well kris noe it ehs.. helped me reply most of th msges lohs..haha didnt know how to reply his..'mushyness'!!
trgn were lik SLACK!!watched stupid video which is kinda useful i guess n it rained..carried most of my girls bag...(heavy) both coaches talked alot n we were dismissed!!went to WM 4 dinner with mummy,brenda,cindy n laopo..went home after tt..BORIN ehs?tml im gg to study in sch!!keep myself occupied!!
*he msged me smth stupid la!!haha!! i fell 4 it as i tot *y told *him abt joanna(my fake) n me.. it was just a joke..didnt hear *his laughter 4 SO long..was glad tt *hes still as happy n cheerful..i ended msg again...
(im determined ehs

**~31/07/07~**

tiring day!!was up last nite till abt 2 plus..was on th phone with *him.. mix feelings!!wanted to let *him noe tt i'll b tere 4 *him wen *he nid sum1 to talk to..mayb i still care alot abt *him..forgive me guys!!lolz..nv in my life i lied so many times in one shot la..*I DO LOVE *YOU OK?* at brief times i wanted to just tell th truth..BUD i realised tt *he mite b just lying to me AGAIN..anw..i reali did my part to keep tis show gg on n real..i even reminded *him to rmb tis date of 'enlightening of truth' la..my plan is to tell *him th truth on th 30/01/08 which is next year!!*he did reali lame stuff lik creating msges tt saes "joanna love meiyan" stuff.. im advicing *him to go bk to sch AGAIN...cant *YOU just concentrate studying? im stepping out of tis soon..time needed!!
sch was as rushy as ever..did irp file.. like finaly la!!haha taught rayson abit of poa..*sorry..was realy tired tdy..hope u understand my explainations!!thx u 4 not deleting th pics in my phone..(th pics = me n *him)they meant smth to me.. guess im not ready yet to delete *our stuff..miss talking to *you on th phone..guess tere wont b next time..left sch after teaching abit of poa at 4plus..went to JP 4 SUBWAY!!(rayson made kris n me so hungry n eager 4 it)cookies were great!!YUMMY!!(smth happened... [secret])went home after tt..
played wit henna tdy to kip myself awake in class..both my arms r being drawn lik crazy!!haha had to ask laopo draw a 'dongdong .jo' to put on frenster to carry on acting.. took th pic wit th 'dong' in th toliet!!haha disgusting rite?
*to laopo!!th [2] was purely bcox i like th num alot..n i missed *him..BUD im making progress oks!! haha
went to tag a fatty blog just now..hu ask *THEM* to say such mean tins to kris n us!!
well..tml..sch,bb trgn,nite study n home..long day!!bud im pleased with th arrangements..
**no matter wad happen..*you r still have a special place in my heart..just lik rayson had said..memories r not to b erased or forgotten..bud..i'll just move on wit my life w/o *you in th pic,my life..**

**~1/8/07~**

tdy was a $$ losing day!! altho i didnt realy mind but i saved hard 4 it oks!!lolz take it as a treat to my god bros then..
trgn was lik ok bud i keep nagging as tho it was realy tough..ate cup noodles 4 these 3 days in a row..damn..realy getting sick of it..fell aslp in class tdy..TIRED!!slpt at 1am to wait 4 my pe clothes..wth ehs?
nite study was OK..did abit of poa n maths..not up to my expectations la of cox..taught rayson acc again..damn!!i keep making mistakes..bud he knows his stuff y still wan me to tutor him?
went home late!!waiting 4 the three guys to finish SHK.. was thinking abt *him altho i was msging with rayson abt stupid missing stuff..guess he was just trying to cheer me up..*he sent me lame msg AGAIN..wen i told rayson tt i'll stop tinking of *him..is tis fate or just PURE coincidence?
realy tired..gotta finish my poa homework..(as i will)
*he stopped schling again i guess.. dont understand what the hell *he is tinking..so wad if u had found a job?study is much more impt OK?sigh..how i wish i still have the right to influence you back to the right patch..stupid *I*..just dont like tt girl.. cant *she control more abt *him??
tml is a long day in sch!!may i pull thru it w/o fallin aslp!!
(P.S. my frenster shoutout is for *you..
~D~ is for DELL..i realy miss *you..cox tml is er hao lehs..rmb the days? )

**~2/8/07~**

today is er hao lehs!!worst er hao i eva had!! normally on er hao, i'll have good good meals as i'll b celebrating wit *him la..tis month??instant noodle 4 the whole day as my meals!!well if we're still tgt,tis month will b our [one year n tenth month] being tgt..
*he msged me last nite (lame stuff again to begin our conversation as usual)..we kinda quarreled over *his studies stuff AGAIN..i cldnt control my temper..guess im too tired n suffering frm lack of slp too..kept fallin aslp in mt class tdy..(= i told *him abt joanna n i the "anni" stuff..to agitate *him..well it works!!*he kalled mi tdy wen im having econs ..JUST TO CONGRAT. me la..lame uhs?its er hao..i miss *him..like ALOT!!
kris was absent tdy!!missed her..our movement frm class to class witout her was much slower la..haha tdy sch was FUN & WIERD!!i kept kallin brenda-BERNARD la..
shared biscuit wit beiebi during gp..haha lik th cookie one!!we were playin train during gp while our classmates were lik presenting la..lol tdy the gers in our class r lik damn united la..wierd uhs?bud i rather unity then having conflicts with e.o..(=
teachers r lik mad!!attitude problems la..but i was wide awake in econs n mob tdy..the ah gua(ahmad) was DISGUSTING during mob..seducing wan la..poor wan!!haha bud tis definitely got the whole class laughing tho..
rayson kalled me wen i just reached home..SORRY 4 not staying back 4 the nite study with u ehs.. well was with beibei n laopo at mac studying til 6 plus then we went to WM 4 a little walk n then home!!
anw tml..sch..bb with laopo n her frens..get to eat prata!!YUMMY!!sick of cup noodles for now!! may get a ride home frm jerome..
lots of hw..piling up..
may my next er hao b better!!(=

**~3/8/07~**

happy happy day!!
sch was ok!!kris seems to b pissed off wit me..dono y..
econs was fun!!grp work was beta then teacher teaching us which normally chant us all to slp..bud mob was as boring as eva..realy nid to work harder 4 mob..well was studying hard the whole day..so hardworkin till laopo n i studied in the lib tgt till 3 plus then went to play bb with her frens..was doin acc n laopo taught me maths!!thx laopo!! tis is the MOST fruitful session of studying i eva had nowadays..
bb was bad!!at fers no1 came down to play la..finally had competitors bud they were lik DAMN pro lohs..lost lik mad la..haha didnt perspire alot tis time..went 4 cheese prata after changing in sch.. lied to aaron(laopo's bf) tt laopo fell in the toliet..im owas doin such jobs..(the other time was 4 beibei) PRATA was lik super delicious!!mayb im too hungry n i didnt had a decent meal 4 the past few days..the stupid hampy(kenrick) was irritating me with qns abt ghosts wen he knew tt i can see la!!made me so frightened tt i didnt dare to go home alone!!kalled my dad to make him pick me up wen i reach home ltr..im a fortunate daughter!!went to play pool next..took a bus to west coast cc as jerome had to pick his sis frm chianatown..we were practically scaring e.o in the bus with ju-on n shutter ghosts la!!HAHAHA laopo pinched me hard wen i was scaring her..=P hampy kept bitting his nails which was like *him la..made mi tink of *him..
WELL we were lik running towards the car after our game cox jerome was like waiting very long 4 us..poor thing ehs?
as jerome want to fetch his sis so left kenrick,me,laopo n aaron playin..the results 3-2..WE(kenrick n me) won!!the last match was the most tiecho of all!!i was laughing n playing lik mad in the pool room..havent had such fun 4 a long time!! kenrick n i did so many stupid stuffs (including a part which he moved a ball while aaron n laopo wasn't lookin la..we kept quiet tho.. )thx u laopo 4 such a wonderful time!!haha
jerome sent me home altho i didnt noe the way home frm west coast la..haha SORRY!!finally found our way to yishun..jerome kept saying sorry to me..WIERD la..
anw in the end, i end up gg home alone!!so scary!!the bitter taste of being single n independent!!
blogging till 3 plus, b4 tt doin my gp proj..its like due on MON la!!y m i owas rushing thru my gp proj.s? o.O hope my grp members will hand in the research to me on time on sunday so tt i wont nid to chiong lik MAD to compile evytin up..(= may we pass!!
tireds!!!day after day im gg to bed even later.. im seriously VERY tired oks?haha
anw..tml will b gg to esplande to catch zahidah's band performing n later in the nite FIREWORKS with laopo,aaron n mayb jerome n hampy..i like tis kind of busy life!!
(saying of fireworks..made me tink of *him...*we were tgt last year watchin fireworks tgt sumwhere near kallang stadium..sweet memories!!oh ya!!*he sent me long long msg last nite..its been REALY a long time since i received *his long long msg wishing me good nite lohs..miss those days!!!anw im REALY sorry tt i feel aslp last nite while msging with *him..i didnt min to!!*he is sick,having flu.. hope *he will recover real soon tho..was waiting 4 *him to contact me the whole day tdy la..*his phone not in use..cant contact *him..[I MISS *YOU!!])
oh ya..kor msged me again in the morning..kris helped me to reply again..he managed to find till *him la..while i cant.. i did kalled *his phone n house..kor was being mushy again..
its late!!nitey

**~4/8/07~**


i cldnt belief what i just saw on frenster la..*him n *s pics.. like got a shock lidat..bud the 'blow' is not as much as see-ing *him wit *her la..went to do my daily routine..haha *she isn't blogging much nowadays tho..BUD i know tt they are mittin tdy,rite NOW as its *s bdae..wished her on frenster..well its her bdae ehs?shldnt b so bad..*he kalled me 4 like for no reason la..the whole conversation ended lik in less then a min n *his whole point of kalling is to tell me tt *he is working tml n asking me if i got mit joanna anot.. i didnt wana hang up..wanted to ask hu r those gers *he is with as i can hear them in the background..bud *he kept saying bye..NO CHOICE!!said bye n *he hung up.. i miss *you..do *you noe tt?sigh..im relying too much on others again..*he kaled AGAIN..kalled me DA SAO!!argh!!i dowan n im NOT ur da sao..wtf la..we r chatting once again..shld i b happy or sad..i seriously dono what *he treats me as?onli will contact me wen *hes alone..shall stop talkin abt tis..
ANW..im seriously SUPER tired la..had onli 5 hrs of slp tdy..was up last nite till 5am blogging n waiting 4 my hair to dry so that i can slp..my sis woke me up at 10 just to send her to tuition la..cldnt fall back to slp ltr..went out wit laopo n frens..had to bring my sis along as no1 will b home early..poor ger..coughing like mad la..shes aslp now..hope she will feel beta..(=
was window shopping the whole day..NO $ = SUCKS!!suddenly have the urge of buying SO many tins la.. (was looking at a wallet n i asked my sis for her opinion..hate her ans as it was = get *him to buy 4 you lo..)i was like WTF..TOTALY!! zahidah's performance is great!!well went to mit my dad at bishan to fetch us hm..lousy n kinda boring day tdy..missed the fireworks performance.. which was like the whole purpose of my outing la.. bad luck i guess..
tml will be staying at home whole day to complete my work n gp proj..hope my members will send their part asap!!
(mayb *he is kallin me ltr to chat..shld i wait or not?im lik veri slpy alr..)
*[i will never care for other like the way i cared for *him..
will never feel the same to other like the way i felt for *him..
bud tere's no point in back tracking now as its mission impossible!!
all i can do is to learn to let go and let myself out of the misery..
^i wana be with you..^ rmb this song?
i sincerely wish *you the best for evytin..
i WILL move on..]*
i loved you whole heartedly..why wont u return the same or even more amount of love back to me?m i asking too much?
LOVE HURTS!!single is THE best!!
oh ya..smth scary happened!!my scary past seems to be hunting me down again..altho im leaving far away frm where i used to stay..i IMMEDIATELY block tt user la..im scared.. bud tere's no1 i can turn to..stop bugging me!!
im gg to work next week to earn $ so that i can buy what i wish for..its realy hard saving $ frm my allowance..
and *BOY..im using the com to blog abt my day..im NOT chatting wit any okay..
conclusion..BAD DAY.

**~5/8/07~**


woke up early again just to fetch sis frm church n im practically walking like a zombie!!cldnt get back to slp lik ytd..reread my harry potter book again..ate my lunch n watched cartoon network to kill time..was waiting 4 my turn to use the com 4 my GP proj n my members to finish doin their part..fell aslp eventually..
woken up by shan's call..(surprise surprise!!)had a long talk abt *him and part of it was catching up on e.o..ANW decided to help shan to get *him back to sch..which was to put our relationship problems aside..impartial ehs?HAHAH!!will b meeting them tis sat at 7.30pm at town's largest starbucks..well..hope i'll b able to convince *him..
decided to start working on my GP proj BUD my bro wont let me use it as hes oso rushing his ppt la.. no choice..rushed to laopo's house asap when it was alr 7+pm la..i started working on GP asap bud felt real stress as laopo's whole family were at home xcept 4 her eldest sis.. dinner was FANTASTIC!!fishball n salmon!!YUMMY!!i ate alot.. chiong till 11.30pm non stop after my dinner..sorry guys!!i finished it in a rush..my worst fears came true la!! NO bus to get me to the mrt..it was getting late..decided to just cabb back..(i seriously regret making this decision..)btwn this time,i was on the phone wit *him..was glad tt *he kalled me back asap the moment i kalled *him..we quarrelled over *his sch matters again..managed to get a cab in the end..
in my bloodly whole life,i've NEVER seen such idiotic taxi-driver who kept asking me 4 directions wen i,myself am a direction idiot!!PLS uncle!!i dont even know how to go hm at such hour la!!the T.D was like turning rounds n rounds,taking a longer road back to my place,worrying tt i wont have enuff $ to pay him..resulting in my cab fare to b like EX!!F*CK la!!during tis time,the rhibena in my bag leaked la!!luckily my stuff didnt get realy wet.. BUD during tis period of commotion,i accidently hang up *his kal..wen im done drying my bag(its shocking tt i had a tissue pac with me!! ) then i realised he didnt even bother to kall me back la!! times had changed i guess..well im no longer the one *he loves anymore.. *he TOTALLY don even bother abt me la..even bernard n wifey(jane) bothered to msg me to ask if i had reached home safely..
i reached hm at 12++..i cldnt control myself n msged *him in the end,tellin *him tt *he had changed..*he kalled me immediately tho,tellin me tt *he'll call me wen *he reach hm..however..i fell aslp..heys..im really exhausted frm the stupid GP la..TIRED!!

**~6/8/07~**

i swear i had plans for skipping sch bud after my effort for the GP which has to b presented TDY..i had no choice but to go sch la.. bud i woke up late..rushed out n found out tt i DID forget to take sum tins..damn it!!kris woke up late too!! beibei were on the same train as us n the three of us were nearly late..LUCKY!!
sch is just as boring wen im lik half dead..slpt 4 most of the lessons..our GP presentation was lik half way done la..ARGH!!if i knew..i wldnt even turn up 4 sch(all my grp members were feeling th same as me..^^)..i was lik half aslp n half awake 4 maths BUD im still listening la.. mr lim gave us a 10mins break which turn out to b a short nap 4 most of us..long live mr lim!! kris won me a minnie scotchtape durin mt period!!yeappie!! pe was lame..(as usual)
after pe,maths remadial then trgn.. mr lim n ser quarrelled la!!HAHAHA..sorry mr lim.. trgn ended at 8pm(damn early) as onli the year ones showed up la..anw i ended up doing stupid jobs which were lik michael's..im lik michael NO.2 now lo..
went hm alone (4 the fers time) as i had lots of work to do(bet the guys were feeling relieved!!)..was msging with *him al the while on my way home..*he sent me a good nite msg last nite which i tink its gonna b my last.. we quarrelled in the morning as *he said *he recalled some of *our memories wen *he was on *his way to work..then i was lik 'then why didnt u rmb me,my love n our happy times?n u had to make a choice btwn *I n me!!'
reached hm..slacked.did my hw after ending msg with *him..wishing *him all the best (i truely wish *him OKAYS!!)with whoever *hes going to be with..(*I) as *he replied tt *hes gg to find a stead tt *they can last long with.. i didnt know tt *he meant *hes words la!!*y msged me,told me tt *he got stead..n she was *T(tricia)..got a shock altho i knew tt tis wld happened sooner or later..BUD i expected the girl to be *I lohs..
lost all my mood in doing anytin!!dont know y im feeling so bad n sad la..
*girl..its really time to leave n forget evtin abt *him..be independent okay..u go girl!!
tml = sch(sigh), movie with kris to occupy my time n i tink i'll feel better after i spend $ to give myself a treat..hm n dreamland!!

*~~7/8/07~**

sch was as tiring as ever..forced myself to go to sch as my GP presentation is still lik half way done.. i nearly kill myself during econs presentation.. think im gonna flung it..oh well,heck la!saved my stomach n $ during break 4 later's movie..arfah said tt my grp's presentation was great la.. n took our hardcopy ppt to zap 4 my class..im lik !!haha!!was super easy to keep myself awake tdy during maths as im DAMN hungry!!
rushed off to AMK HUB for our movie..ALONE!!didnt manage to pull beibei along wit us(kris n i)..i tot the ghost was lik casper BUT!!ANW the movie was nice..better then expected la.. i tot i'll be the one screaming mostly BUT it was KRIS..no offence ehs!! there was one part where it was lik OK then she screamed, scaring evy1 in the cinema la.. it was fun watching wit u,kris!!
shopped at AMK 4 awhile..decided tt we'll b watching the SECRET tml(to keep myself occupied as usual.. )went hm..cook dinner..quarrelled with my bro as he just simply refuse to help me transfer songs into my mp3 la!! lazy ass!!was in a bad mood after tt..didnt bother to help him prepare his dinner..i ate twice as much as usual..surprise ehs?haha!!home cooked food is just simply MUCH more delicious then fast food..watched 9pm tv prog n went to bed early..tts y i like gg hm early now..makes such a diff wen i reach hm late..
.:made good progress tdy!!was realy angry n sad wen i spoke abt *him to kris..i finally cried!!what *he did to me has hurted me to such extent tt tears will no longer b shed as its TOO hurting..guess tis is our ending to *our relationship..~[iM*u]~ may tml b a better day!!

*~~8/8/07~**

M.I's celebrations 4 N.D is lik SO boring la!!the onli part tt was worth watching was the parade..papa was like the most outstanding of all as he dont realy know how to march properly..HAHAHA!!i wasnt realy enjoying myself,even fell aslp at the hall..was realy surprised tt mum ask me y bother to go sch in the morning..woke up late as usual tdy.. sorry dad!!
after sch rushed to cwp to catch our(kris n i) movie..the SECRET!!was playing with mama,uncle n more while waiting 4 the bus to B.B inter..is my cheeks chubby of am i fat?y mama n ppl lik to pinch them? haha
managed to grab a pair of tickets b4 they were sold out..OH MY GOSH!!secret is REALLY VERY nice!!MUST MUST watch la ppl!!jay chou n xiao yu were like DAMN sweet!!its a VERY romantic movie..haha u will NEVER expect him to act like tt la..**-i tot of *him n *our happy times..was wondering if *we were tt sweet n loving wen *we were tgt..-** ANWS the movie is defintely worth the $8 la!!tdy im a HAPPY HAPPY girl!!we were lik deciding what to eat b4 the movie as we had so many 'feels' for our brunch..we ended up eating sakae sushi's ala cartla..well the both of us had the $ what.. (excuses) altho it was quite ex bud im HAPPY!!don even feel the pinch at all..a 'full full' girl is a HAPPY HAPPY girl!!
went to another place to shop as kris wana buy jeans..i had no intention of buying anytin as im BROKE!!bud kris owas manage to tempt me to buy stuff la.. haha!!now im her debtor!!will pay u back asap!!dont like owing ppl tins,esp $!!
went home str after our shopping..i had to wait 4 like TWO hours 4 my mum to reach home as she went to lock the main door wen my key is spoilt after tt day's forcing in.. luckily i had my harry potter with me!!bud my butt was numb after the two hours of sitting la..haha had dinner..blogged..*y was like asking if im fine..ello!!what u expect me to say or do?i maybe REAL happy on the outside bud my heart's breaking in the inside..i really just cant accept the fact n i just cant let go tt easily..sorry..but give me more time pls..
*-my life's no longer the same when *you left me..be happy ehs.. -*
i'll be fine...
tml is public holi..no tuition tml as tutor is busy..BORING..i wont be watching the fireworks like last year.. c how different it is w/o *him?sigh..shall stay at home n ROT... misses.....

**~9/8/07~**

happy birthday singapore!!
was at home the whole day..BORING!!surfing the net the whole morning n afternoon as my bro wasn't at home..HEHEHE!!watched more tv prog n reread harry potter..super no life uhs? no choice...bet *he is having a great time with *T..last year *we went to kallang just to catch the fireworks..unforgettable times!!ANWS its the PAST..no point pondering over it.. had the SAME dinner like ytd.. (i ate even more tis time!! ) watch the ndp at home.. this year's ndp was nice..better then expected la..watched more tv prog n ate DURIANS!!YUMMY!!^^
off to bed..im like a pig.. didnt study at all tdy..DIANACMY!!pls get ur ass working!! tml home..slack..mayb i'll study..or shall meet kris out to study tgt..
im getting better at what im forcing myself to do..im NOT gg to bother myself in finding how *T looks like..its no longer my biz..*we ARE over...

**~10/8/07~**


im getting a new number soon!!my mum was lik asking me out in the morning to meet her at AMK hub at noon to go get the new plan BUT i wanted a better phone..SO once i save enuff for my dream phone N76 which cost like $498 la..shall work n save hard for it!! ate my lunch at the food court n saw a surprising number of babies at the food court..my gosh!!they ARE cute to the max!!was recalling my sister's 'baby' times..she was DAMN cute when she was a baby BUt now..shes an irritating ass.. my mum even joked abt giving birth to one more to let me play with..NO WAY ALRIGHT!!i finally have my freedom now that my sis has grown up..i even have to take her out along with me sumtimes..
anw met wifey n co.(aaron.rudy n pitt) ltr in the afternoon at cck to play bb..one of them is quite good looking..HAHA abit like michael BUT he is much more better looking then michael la.. went to play bb at a new court..tt place's really challenging n i met till a SUPER 'ungentlemanly' guy who wanted to elbow str. in my face la!! in my 3years plus of playing bb i NEVER met such guy..tt guy was trying to elbow me non stop in my stomach..where have all the good guys gone to?ANW pitt's bb skill is astonishing..haha he reali is better then michael..wifey was doing the same matchmaking stuf.. im satisfied with my single life now..wont ask for anytin better.. during 1 of our match pitt n rudy were like passing ard..TEAMWORK..but when rudy wanted to pass back to pitt,it hit pitt's head instead as he wasnt expecting the ball wld be pass back to him.. SUPER comedy la..beside tt 'ungentlemanly' guy i met,otherwise the whole night was funny n great..
tot of *him when im playing bb..*he wld have gone to the guy n ask him to be more gentleman la n will ask me to stop playing str away..in the first place *he doesnt like me to play bb..but *hes always so protective of me.. miss those days..but its over!!
had dinner at ljs at lot 1 didnt finish it..no appetite..went to mac after tt to sit and talk talk as all of us didnt wana go home that early..wifey n i were playing coin flipping games n pinching each other..we play till our face were red la..haha it was fun!!when we were playing coin flipping game..aaron had to flip a coin n wifey n i have to flip ours to hit aaron's..but our coins kept dropping which irritate aaron n he stopped flipping 4 us..anw aaron n pitt's arms bcame walls to prevent our coins from falling..(pitt's eyes are reali big!!)
reached home at 12plus..wifey said tt rudy want my num..decided to give it ti him anw we're just friends..
tml work at vivo..wont be gg to meet *him n co. ltr in the evening..*we didnt contact *each other 4 quite long alr..
WELL it was a fruitful day tdy,gain more experience n met a good-looking guy(HAHA)..(=

**~11/8/07~**

i was super late 4 work tdy!!
woke up early tho as i tot its was alr 11plus in the morning..my bro lied to me la.. his bloody phone kept ringing thruout the whole morning n i kept asking what time isit..
was taking my time to prepare as usual n then i realise tt i can blog as my bro is on his way out to catch a movie.. i was in a rush as my bro left at ard 11 plus n i started blogging asap when i havent even have my lunch n pack my stuff.. in the end i left at 12plus to rush to work n i havent finish blogging la!! when im on the way to work alr then i realise that i didnt collect my allowance from my mum..which mins i'll have to wait till my mum n sis come to vivo then i can have my dinner..
